description:
There is one bed in the bedroom, and in the living room the couch converts to a bed. The apartment is equipped with basic appliances, such as: 47" Flat Screen TV, wireless Internet service, linens, towels, and soap. The apartment is located just three short blocks from the N and Q Trains with less than 10 minutes to Times Square, Brooklyn, & more fun places. The neighborhood is quiet and convenient for everyday needs.

This is a large but cozy one bedroom apartment with everything you need to get by the night and day with friends and family. There's enough room to dance or call it a movie night.

I am accessible to my guests 24 hours, don't hesitate to shoot me a text or email.

The neighborhood is a block away from a diverse choice of restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies, & bars.

Pretty much everything is walking distance but if you need public transportation the N & Q are three short blocks away, there are three different bus routes in a few block radius & taxis are picked up under the train station on 31 street between Ditmars Blvd and 23rd avenue.
name: Large one bedroom with a homey feel
